verses.verse: Rejoice <S%H7442><s%> in Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> you righteous! <S%H6662><s%> Praise <S%H8416><s%> is fitting <S%H5000><s%> for the upright. <S%H6662><s%>
Give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> with the lyre. <S%H3658><s%> Sing <S%H2167><s%> praises to him with the harp <S%H5035><s%> of ten strings. <S%H6218><s%>
Sing <S%H7891><s%> to him a new <S%H2319><s%> song. <S%H7892><s%> Play <S%H5059><s%> skillfully <S%H3190><s%> with a shout of joy! <S%H8643><s%>
For the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is right. <S%H3477><s%> All his work <S%H4639><s%> is done in faithfulness. <S%H530><s%>
He loves <S%H157><s%> righteousness <S%H6666><s%> and justice. <S%H4941><s%> The earth <S%H776><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of the loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
By Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s word, <S%H1697><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> were made; <S%H6213><s%> all their army <S%H6635><s%> by the breath <S%H7307><s%> of his mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
He gathers <S%H3664><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> together as a heap. <S%H5067><s%> He lays up <S%H5414><s%> the deeps <S%H8415><s%> in storehouses. <S%H214><s%>
Let all the earth <S%H776><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Let all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the world <S%H8398><s%> stand in awe of him. <S%H1481><s%>
For he spoke, <S%H559><s%> and it was done. <S%H6680><s%> He commanded, and it stood firm. <S%H5975><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> brings <S%H6331><s%> the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> to nothing. <S%H6331><s%> He makes <S%H5106><s%> the thoughts <S%H4284><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%> to be of no effect. <S%H5106><s%>

The counsel <S%H6098><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> stands <S%H5975><s%> fast forever, <S%H5769><s%> the thoughts <S%H4284><s%> of his heart <S%H3820><s%> to all <S%H1755><s%> generations. <S%H1755><s%>
Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the nation <S%H1471><s%> whose God <S%H430><s%> is Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> whom he has chosen <S%H977><s%> for his own inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> looks <S%H5027><s%> from heaven. <S%H8064><s%> He sees <S%H5027><s%> all the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men. <S%H120><s%>
From the place <S%H4349><s%> of his habitation <S%H3427><s%> he looks <S%H7688><s%> out on all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%>
he who fashions <S%H3335><s%> all <S%H3162><s%> of their hearts; <S%H3820><s%> and he considers <S%H995><s%> all of their works. <S%H4639><s%>

There is no king <S%H4428><s%> saved <S%H3467><s%> by the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of an army. <S%H2428><s%> A mighty man <S%H1368><s%> is not delivered <S%H5337><s%> by great <S%H7230><s%> strength. <S%H3581><s%>
A horse <S%H5483><s%> is a vain thing <S%H8267><s%> for safety, <S%H8668><s%> neither does he deliver <S%H4422><s%> any by his great <S%H7230><s%> power. <S%H2428><s%>
Behold, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh's eye <S%H5869><s%> is on those who fear <S%H3373><s%> him, <S%H3176><s%> on those who hope in his loving kindness; <S%H2617><s%>
to deliver <S%H5337><s%> their soul <S%H5315><s%> from death, <S%H4194><s%> to keep them alive <S%H2421><s%> in famine. <S%H7458><s%>
Our soul <S%H5315><s%> has waited <S%H2442><s%> for Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> He is our help <S%H5828><s%> and our shield. <S%H4043><s%>
For our heart <S%H3820><s%> rejoices <S%H8055><s%> in him, <S%H982><s%> because we have trusted in his holy <S%H6944><s%> name. <S%H8034><s%>
Let your loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> be on us, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, since we have hoped in you. <S%H3176><s%>
